text: Bjorn Fratangelo was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Tennys Sandgren won the title after defeating João Pedro Sorgi 6–4, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Savannah Challenger - Singles 2017 Singles
title: 2017 Savannah Challenger – Singles
